docs.snippet: The Colts’ T. Y. Hilton had a strong regular season before shredding the Chiefs in the opening round of the N.F.L. playoffs....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Colts’ T. Y. Hilton had a strong regular season before shredding the Chiefs in the opening round of the N.F.L. playoffs.
docs.abstract: Indianapolis Colts receiver T Y Hilton, overshadowed by quarterback Andrew Luck, has had a strong regular season and played an integral role in team's narrow victory over the Kansas City Chiefs in wild-card round of AFC playoffs.

headline.main: T. Y. Hilton Is an Overshadowed but Integral Part of Colts’ Success
headline.print_headline: Hilton Is an Overshadowed but Integral Part of the Colts’ Success

docs.snippet: An encounter with Jaime Weston-Parouse, vice president for brand and creative at the N.F.L....
docs.lead_paragraph: An encounter with Jaime Weston-Parouse, vice president for brand and creative at the N.F.L.
docs.abstract: Profile of Jaime Weston-Parouse, vice president for brand and creative at the National Football League; she describes working with the league, licensees, sponsors, broadcast partners and teams to present a cohesive brand image and message, a function that did not exist when she was hired in 2003.

headline.seo: At the N.F.L., Jaime Weston-Parouse Is Vice President for Brand and Creative
headline.print_headline: In the Running, Behind the Scenes

docs.snippet: FIFA’s secretary general said the tournament in Qatar would probably be held between mid-November 2022 and mid-January 2023....
docs.lead_paragraph: FIFA’s secretary general said the tournament in Qatar would probably be held between mid-November 2022 and mid-January 2023.
docs.abstract: FIFA secretary general Jerome Valcke suggests that the 2022 World Cup in Qatar will most likely not be played during summer, but rather between November and January.

headline.main: Official Suggests 2022 Cup Won’t Be in Summer
